about_the_game:
This is not just any drinking game! Welcome to the Mixology Hostess Club, dear customer!
You seem to have run into quite the predicament and now the only way out is to mix it up! That's right, you're Mixology's newest bartender! So get to work!
Mix drinks, explore the city, and most importantly spend time with the hostesses! Chat them up, buy them drinks and learn their stories. Successfully woo them and just maybe you could change their fate and yours!

Mix
Make drinks for the customers, earn money, and show those hostesses what you got!

Chat Them Up
Flirt with each hostess and learn their stories. Just spending time with them will gain affection but there is always room to gain more!

Free Time
While you're not being worked to the bone, you'll be given some free time to go wherever you like. Meet other characters around town,
